title: Children's Alphabet book tops NYT bestseller list
content:
[Number 1 Children’s picture Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026140400/http:/us.macmillan.com/BookCustomPage.aspx?isbn=9781596434257&m_type=2&m_contentid=339238#video) for November 4th NY Times bestseller list

 [‹ Best laser printer for text?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026140400/http:/typophile.com/node/12745 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type setters apron - ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026140400/http:/typophile.com/node/50855 "Go to next forum topic")
author: terminaldesign

comments.content: It’s clearly Dutch. Note the ij ligature in the video!

Read it to your infants, by all means, but don’t let them get their hands on it.  
Somewhat fragile.  
I had a Hans Andersen pop-up book when I was young, when I opened the page, Hansel would slide the old lady into the oven.
